description: Submission of a field notebook containing observations and interpretations from four local field trips. Report length: 8 pages (2 pages per trip). Assesses understanding of environmental processes through field observations.
Laboratory-based report analyzing data from four lab classes (weeks 7-10). Requires interpretation of environmental processes through lab observations. Word limit: 2000 words.
Eight weekly short tests (5% each) assessing pre-class preparation materials before lab/field sessions. Best 6 out of 8 marks count toward final grade. Conducted as pen-and-paper tests in class.
